entry.title: Updates To Website Coming.
entry.summary: Hi. I will be redoing some of the page structuring for the website. Mainly these changes will only effect software and game pages, not post. The first changes are to the Navigation Bar and to the Software page. Other changes that are coming will also…
entry.content:
Hi. I will be redoing some of the page structuring for the website. Mainly these changes will only effect software and game pages, not post. The first changes are to the Navigation Bar and to the Software page. Other changes that are coming will also be listed here.

Navigation Bar

The navigation bar will be updated to more fit a format that is easier for me people to understand. While not all changes will go into effect instantly, it will still have some changes.

Software Page

The software page will now be split up into categories, the "Solo Programs" category, and a series category.

Game Page

The game page will get a similar treatment to the software page, but instead of "Solo Programs" and a series category, they will get the following:

  • Original Game
  • Fan-Game
  • Jam-Game

Blog Structure

You may have already noticed that the way that the post are displayed on a page has been changed, that was the first step, but now I have finished with those changes.

Questions

If you have questions, feel free to contact me, or visit the Q&A section on each page.

entry.title: I'm doing the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!
entry.summary: Hi! I am doing the GMTK 2020 Game Jam on Itch.IO. While I am waiting on the Jam to start, I will be working another software, that I have yet to announce, but can be found on my GitHub. I do not own the GMTK…
entry.content:
Hi! I am doing the GMTK 2020 Game Jam on Itch.IO. While I am waiting on the Jam to start, I will be working another software, that I have yet to announce, but can be found on my GitHub.

I do not own the GMTK Game Jam. The GMTK Game Jams are owned by GMTK (Game Maker's Tool Kit). Please show support for the jam. If you able to make games, why not consider joining the GMTK Game Jam? For more information on what the Game Jam is about, please visit the Itch.IO Page linked above. Thank you! Game Jam Logo by GMTK.

entry.title: Meet Kattu, The EasyInno Snake.
entry.summary: Meet Kattu. He is the face of EasyInno. Here is there to help you throughout the program. If you need help, he will be there! While kind, he is shy, and scared easily. What does he eat? I mean, he is a snake. While you…
entry.content:
Meet Kattu.

He is the face of EasyInno.

Here is there to help you throughout the program. If you need help, he will be there! While kind, he is shy, and scared easily.

What does he eat? I mean, he is a snake. While you may think he is like a corn snake, or something. He is not, he really doesn't eat anything. Um... Yeah. I know Kattu is kinda a weird color, but that doesn't bother him. Kattu is just a nice little snake. :D

So... Yeah. Kattu. The EasyInno Snake.

Kattu © TheCrafters001 2020.
EasyInno © TheCrafters001 2020 under GNU GPL V3.

entry.title: Introducing My New Logo!
entry.summary: Hi! I am super happy to show you something I have made.
entry.content:
Hi! I am super happy to show you something I have made.

My old logo was just plain and simple. Nothing wrong with it, I think just plain text got a little boring. I mean, here. Look at this.

Does it not look boring? So, I have made a new one! Have a look.

I find it much better than just some text. While, yes, I am using the same font, I have changed it up a bit. I have updated my website to fit these changes, even the icon in the tab has change! I am happy with this change, but hey, I like it. You may hate it, I don't care if you do. I am keeping it like this for a while, so... sorry if you hate it.

entry.title: TheCrafters001 Direct has ended
entry.summary: So, I am sorry to say this, but after long consideration, I have decided to kill off TheCrafters001 Direct
entry.content:
So, I am sorry to say this, but after long consideration, I have decided to kill off TheCrafters001 Direct

The reason being is that I never really updated it. But hey, I am going to look on the bright side, I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you are just going to have to live with my VB.NET software, sorry.

entry.title: New Project: EasyInno.
entry.summary: EasyInno is a simple IDE that allows you to make Inno Setup Scripts with ease! More about the project will be revealed as the project is being worked on.
entry.content: EasyInno is a simple IDE that allows you to make Inno Setup Scripts with ease! More about the project will be revealed as the project is being worked on.

entry.title: The Adventure of Block reset
entry.summary: I have decided to reset the "The Adventure of Block" project.
entry.content:
I have decided to reset the "The Adventure of Block" project.

Reason

The reason why I have decided to do this, is because I am not very good at makeing assets for RPG Maker MV. I will use a lot of the default RPG Maker MV envirement sprites, but I will use some of my custom assets.

Sorry.

However, the current demo is still avaliable to play.

You can play it on the Games page.

entry.title: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!
entry.summary: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!
entry.content: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!1.3.0.1 is the last version of Flash Player 2. There will be no more updates.
